cover_page.title: Sample Public Initiative Proposal
cover_page.author: Kevin G. Smith
cover_page.audience: This text is part of the audience element.

intro.p: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. cover_letter.intro_para: I am interested in the Simulation Engineering job at ABC Widgets. After talking with you at the Knowledge University job fair , I became interested in the job. I have enjoyed my past work with Simulation Engineering in the past and I think I will fit well with ABC Widgets culture and bring all the necessary abilities to go above and beyond my job requirements.

para_background.experience: I bring previous experience with C++ from my work at 123 Consulting. I used C++ while contributing to their weather simulation and improved their computing efficiency with it.
I have also improved my ability in Java while working on a chess program in my spare time.
I gained communication skills from my work as a TA at Knowledge University. I often had to explain technial info in many different ways.

para_closing.compatability: I think I will fit in well with the start up culture of ABC Widgets.
para_closing.next_step: I hope you will call me at 1-800-999-9999 so we can discuss the next step in the hiring process.

report.p: Peer review report will appear here.
Comments on assignment will appear here.
